articles.title: Singapore reports 42 new coronavirus cases, taking tally to 844 - TheChronicleHerald.ca
articles.description: SINGAPORE (Reuters) - Singapore reported 42 new coronavirus cases on Sunday, its health ministry said, taking total infections to 844. The Southeast Asian city-state suffered its third coronavirus-related death earlier on Sunday. [S7N28001V]
